CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 17, 1959, page A19, reads: "Pittsburgh Scholarship Guild Supper-Dance - The Pittsburgh Scholarship Guild entertained at a supper-dance Friday night at the Hotel Sherwyn. A full-course dinner was served, and George Spaulding's group played for dancing. Proceeds from the affair are slated for the scholarship fund of the guild. Top photo shows members of the committee. Left to right, standing: Mmes. Cynthia Lee, Fredericka Fulwylie, Evelyn Robinson, Lois Hall, Kay Jones, Betty Watkins and Isabele Stewart. Seated: Gladys Howell, Marcella Hoston and Bessie Paxton. Bottom photo: Among the guests who enjoyed the affair were Mr. and Mrs. Leslie Shelton, Mr. and Mrs. Ira Ritter, Mrs. Nelle Barron, Roosevelt Giddens, Mr. and Mrs. Thaddeus Young, Mrs. Jane Hudson, Mr. and Mrs. Herman Hill, Mrs. Madge Whitsey, Mrs. Dorothy Dennis, Mr. and Mrs. Loster Grant and Mrs. Ethel Chavis. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Four women, including Betty Watkins far left, and two men, gathered around circular banquet table with glasses and ashtrays in Sherwyn Hotel for the Pittsburgh Scholarship Guild Supper-Dance
